bug.author: hyounesy
bug.description: Hello, Is the discrete action masking only considered during training or is it also checked during inference (internal brain)? I am adding the recently introduced action masking to my existing pre trained agents (0.4) and I notice that the agents are choosing the actions regardless of whether they are masked or not.

comments.comment: Action masking was introduced in v0.5. If you are using an older model, the action masking will not work at inference time.
Makes sense. Thanks for the clarification <denchmark-link:https://github.com/vincentpierre>@vincentpierre</denchmark-link> .
This thread has been automatically locked since there has not been any recent activity after it was closed. Please open a new issue for related bugs.
